metadata.title: CVE-2022-29978 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: There is a floating point exception error in sixel_encoder_do_resize,encoder.c:633 in libsixel img2sixel 1.8.6. Remote attackers could leveragethis vulnerability to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted JPEG file.

criterions.comment: libsixel package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
